xmlText.hl2: MELBOURNE (AP) â€” Results Thursday from the Australian Open at Melbourne Park (seedings in parentheses):
xmlText.p: Dominic Thiem (5), Austria, def. Denis Kudla, United States, 6-7 (6), 3-6, 6-3, 6-2, 6-3.
